text: geubunman-eul wihayeo deulineun gidoga jinliini geubun anin daleun geos-e gidohal ttae hananim-eun geudeul-e ge eungdab-eul haji anihasimyeo geudeul eun machi mul-eul hyanghayeo mul-i geuui ib-e ileudoleug duson-eul beollina mul i geuoe ib-e ileuji anhneun geosgwa gatnani bulsinjadeul-ui gidoneun banghwang-ebulgwaham-ila
